body.name: BeeVines Snack Bowl for Stanley Cup, Snack Tray with lid for Pink 40 oz Tumbler with Handle,with Quencher Accessories, Spill Stopper & Handle Strap
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 32 mins
features: 【 A Fun Addition to Almost All 40oz Stanley Dupes, Not Only to Stanley Flowstate Cups 】Unlike other plastic snack ring bowls in the market, BeeVines silicone snack tray bowl is not only designed for pink & cream white Stanley 40 oz quencher H2.0 tumbler with handle, but more importantly this Stanley cup accessories set is perfect for most of 40oz Stanley dupe tumblers of different brands as well. (Just message us your cup size to further confirm the compatibility if unsure.)

【The Ultimate Stanley 40 oz Cup Accessories Set to Fit All Your Needs】BeeVines snack bowl combo set includes one quality silicone snack tray with dustproof lid to keep food fresh, 3 Pcs spill stoppers & straw cover to keep your pink Stanley 40oz quencher tumbler ( H1.0 & H2.0 ) completely spill-proof. What's more, our snack ring set comes with one silicon bottle handle with elastic strap for more convenience & one anti-scratch & non-slip silicone boot for your precious 40oz Stanley dupe cups.

【Food Grade Silicone, Safe & Dishwashable】BeeVines snack bowl accessories set for Stanley dupe cups, including the snack ring, its lid, leak-proof accsessories, bottle boot & handle strap are all made of high quality silicone, safe and odorless. Unlike other plastic snack trays for Stanley Flowstate quencher & H2.0 cup, our snack tray for pink & cream white Stanley 40 oz tumbler with handle, is heat-resistant & dishwasher-safe, durable & reusable.

【4-Compartment Design for Better Snacking Control】BeeVines snack bowl cup accessories for pink & cream Stanley 40 oz quencher tumbler with handle allow you to sip beverage while grabing snacks or fruit within reach. 4 compartments with 1.8-inch-deep design offers just-enough compacity & separate space for a variety of snacks, such as popcorn/potato chips/candy or 3-4 kinds of your favorite fruits, like blueberries/brambles/cranberries so that you could easily control your fat or vitamin intake.

【Start Your Healthy Life with Fun, Perfect Color Match for Your Stanley Cup】BeeVines snack bowl for pink Stanley 40 oz quencher tumbler with handle is the perfect companion for those who own a Stanley cup or a Stanley dupe, whether you're watching a movie or gaming, studying or working, or driving on a road trip. Our snack bowl cups accessories also make perfect New Year gift for your beloved ones to enjoy a healthier life! Drink more water and be heathier & happier with just enough snacking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with my purchase! 🥰
reviews.reviewText: I love how it was packaged , definitely with care and the added instructions were great. I love the feel of the snack tray , it’s very soft silicone and it is a very rich soft cream color. The lid is an added bonus which I didn’t see a lot of them with lids. I’m really glad I bought this one. I will definitely buy other items from BeeVines !! 🧡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars awesome accessory, but could use tweaks to make it perfect
reviews.reviewText: I bought my Stanley cup dupe tumbler, and this accessory pack, at the same time and for the same purpose: drinks and snacks out on the boat this summer. Of course I tried it out right away when it arrived (nice for car snacking too), and can say I am pleased in general.The bowl can hold a good amount (e.g., is deep enough for mini pretzels, peanut butter-filled pretzel puffs, etc.), even with the lid on. I cannot comment on whether my dupe tumbler (SipX) is the exact same dimensions as a Stanley cup, but I will say that on my cup there is a bit of space between the cup and bowl inside (so that the bowl sits at a slight cant, with the handle side higher). This is remedied though by putting the handle strap on underneath the bowl--then the handle strap fills in the little gap and makes it all sit more snugly.I was worried with the design that the handle strap would slip off with a full heavy cup, since it doesn't have anything to catch it, but it is very secure. This is great when you need multiple hands or don't want to look for the cup's handle when the big bowl is in the way, however, I wish it were a bit shorter--because it is made of silicone, it stretches out a good bit with a full cup pulling on it (I could almost put it on my shoulder like a little purse strap).I am very pleased to have the little straw cap, but the other leak-proof accessory pieces I won't be using. Only the round one (for around the straw on the inside) fits on my cup's lid style (which has just one hole, for the straw). Using this does in fact make the entire thing completely leak-proof (tested it out with a full tumbler of water), but I won't actually use it, because it also makes drinking from the straw create a powerful vacuum inside so that drawing liquid up is tough, and the whole cup shudders from the vacuum release when you let go. It may work much better on a different lid style, though.The bowl comes with a lid (main reason #1 why I chose this style over other offerings). I like the lid, but you have to meticulously pull the lip around the bowl edge to secure it. This would be useful traveling back and forth, but not for taking it on and off for frequent snacking. To fix that, the rim of the bowl should have been made solidly round (not flexible, foldable silicone) so the bowl had something more to grip. However, I am still glad I have the lid. The other main reason I selected this version over other offerings is because it is plain, not cutesy--the straw cap is just a cap, the colors are neutral. That's what I wanted!I do like having the silicone boot for the cup. It is shallower than others I have seen, but it stays on (and happens to be the exact same shade of gray as my cup).Overall, I do recommend this set if you have one of these big keep-it-cold tumblers and want the snack bowl accessory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Some pieces didn’t quite fit
reviews.reviewText: This was a cute idea, but not all of the pieces fit the way they were supposed to. I couldn’t ever get the lid to the tray sealed closed, and the piece that connects to the handle barely fit the bottom of my 40oz Stanley, much less the top where it is supposed to go. The accessories are nice, I had just hoped they would fit properly.

reviews.reviewerName: Steve Kittner --- Author of the 'What Lies' Adventure Mystery Series
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A little crazy in these Stanley times but our niece loves it! Got it for her birthday and she could not have been more thrilled! 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great snack bowl
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is great for my teen! She was delighted to use on her 49oz cup for snacks and our Super Bowl family night. It’s stays in place perfectly and holds a good amount for her. She used it for chicken wings, chips, salsa and even fruits. These are great to prevent plate mix ups since it’s attached to the cup. Definitely a keeper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I orderedone of these from curiosity, because I had never seen them before, and was very pleasantly surprised. The set comes with everything except the straw and the cup. You get the bowl, of course, but it also has a lid, which I haven't seen on other bowls of this type- handy to minimize spills. It also has a straw protector, a rubber thingy to put on the bottom of your cup to help keep it from skidding across the table, and a handle you can set up, with hardware. Very well thought out and presented. I could wish, however, for a bit more in the way of instructions, because it took me a while to figure out what each part was and where it went. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really tight fit...could get messy
reviews.reviewText: I get the purpose of being so tight..but its almost terrifying to put the holder band around the cup as it seems it will snap...And just as tough is getting the food holder on and trying to put the lid on...its like Tupperware that you have to put on a certain way or it will not sit right..the Idea is great and the material is easy to clean..but it takes some getting used to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Package Deal
reviews.reviewText: Bee Vines put together an impressive deal. The snack tray, with lid which is a genius addition, plus the handle. The lid snaps together keeping your snack just as free from dirt, bugs and pets inquiring noises. It fits on cup snugly. It does include a straw topper for a large straw or Stanley straw and the cleaning brush. This set makes a nice gift for anyone at any age. Photos show how the accessories look on cup, but cup is not included in package deal.
